metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5847 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The gst_asf_demux_process_ext_content_desc function in gst/asfdemux/gstasfdemux.c in gst-plugins-ugly in GStreamer allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read) via vectors involving extended content descriptors.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-ugly1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
